channel.title: [Delta] Wild glitch please help
channel.description: Its isnt problem with pking or wild lvls or anything in wild. but the skull in bottum left corner then says wild lvl1 or wild lvl4 or w.e lvl your in.. it pops up saying lvl 1 when you walk into the wild or says your wild lvl when you tele in.. but the problem is that when you tele or walk out of wild the "wild lvl #" icon does not go away.. only way to make it go away is to log out or die. it does not really effect the game since even though it wont go away when you walk out of wild, long as you are not in the wild you still cant be attacked or attack.. i just dont like that it wont go away, and its annoying. somebody please tell me what i can do to fix?

item.title: [Delta] Wild glitch please help

item.description:

I am sorry, i dont know what your saying i need to do… ):

item.title: [Delta] Wild glitch please help
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

you could have it update saying lvl 0 or if wilderness level <= 1

close all interfaces

believe there is a void for that

might be
closeall();

item.title: [Delta] Wild glitch please help
item.dc:creator: @krunt_V3 krunt V3
item.description:
@krunt_V3 wrote:

Its isnt problem with pking or wild lvls or anything in wild. but the skull in bottum left corner then says wild lvl1 or wild lvl4 or w.e lvl your in… it pops up saying lvl 1 when you walk into the wild or says your wild lvl when you tele in… but the problem is that when you tele or walk out of wild the “wild lvl #” icon does not go away… only way to make it go away is to log out or die. it does not really effect the game since even though it wont go away when you walk out of wild, long as you are not in the wild you still cant be attacked or attack… i just dont like that it wont go away, and its annoying. somebody please tell me what i can do to fix?
